QuestData.Title: Archdruid of the Claw
QuestData.Description: Near the southern edge of our forest you will find Sleeper's Barrow.$B$BThere, Archdruid Koda Steelclaw and her dedicated disciples carry out their sacred duty to observe the Emerald Dream.$b$bFind disciple Rylissa Bearsong in Steelclaw Vale and notify her of the crisis in the Grove of Cenarius.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Rylissa Bearsong at Steelclaw Vale.
QuestData.RewardText: The forest already whispers of Malfurion's return. There are few among us who have not heard of his deeds.$B$BThe trees said he also travels with a companion, one named $n. Are you $Ghe:she;?
